channel.title: Comments on: Gotta Walk Tall in the Wild West

item.title: By: Gabe
item.dc:creator: Gabe
item.description: man, I dont know you're point exactly but it seems to me that its the exact opposite, granted no gm's but have you ever seen the chat mods interrupt a message youre were going to send? happened to me. And as far as the game screwing you it just doesnt go ignored, NC has worked with me over the course of three weeks making sure that my video driver issues were solved and that the bugs I was experiencing were taking care of, they're out there man, they definetly havent abandoned us. . .
item.content:encoded: man, I dont know you’re point exactly but it seems to me that its the exact opposite, granted no gm’s but have you ever seen the chat mods interrupt a message youre were going to send? happened to me. And as far as the game screwing you it just doesnt go ignored, NC has worked with me over the course of three weeks making sure that my video driver issues were solved and that the bugs I was experiencing were taking care of, they’re out there man, they definetly havent abandoned us. . .
